attributes.action: Stop the building of 9000 houses on the mast site in Rugby
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As part of the government required  expansion of the housing stock in the country Rugby is destined for an eastern extension of Rugby with 9000 houses and some warehousing along the A5 and M1, this is ill conceived it will not form part of Rugby as there is no infrastructure in Rugby to cope with this influx, 9000 homes needs 18000 jobs, 9000 car parking spaces, it will create crime, noise, poor air quality, throttle Rugby's roads and only provide homes for commuters increasing road usage, Rugby is a small market town please leave us alone, the people of Hillmorton will be the worst hit and will be forced from living in a village to living in the center of town and have all the traffic going straight through it into town from the extension we must stop this.
